item.description: Disney is planning to merge Hulu into Disney+ to streamline its streaming services, improve user experience, and boost profitability. read more

item.title: Redwire Corporation Plunges Over 24% Pre-Market Amid Disappointing Q2 Results
item.description: Redwire's stock fell 26.5% pre-market after reporting a big drop in revenue and a much larger net loss for Q2. read more
